function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"SARS-CoV-2 virus transmission in built environments","Impact":"Overwhelmed healthcare systems, increased hospital admissions, and strain on intensive care units","Mitigation":"Implementing non-pharmaceutical interventions (NPIs) to reduce transmission","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, air filtration systems","People":"General population, healthcare workers","Owner":"Governments, building owners"},{"Description":"Infectious phase of SARS-CoV-2 before symptoms appear","Impact":"Difficulty in controlling the spread of the virus","Mitigation":"Increased testing, contact tracing, and quarantine measures","Technologies":"Testing kits, contact tracing apps","People":"General population, public health authorities","Owner":"Public health authorities, governments"},{"Description":"Vulnerability of entire human population to SARS-CoV-2 infection","Impact":"Potential for widespread transmission and high number of cases","Mitigation":"Vaccination campaigns, public health education, and hygiene measures","Technologies":"Vaccines, public health campaigns","People":"General population, healthcare workers","Owner":"Governments, public health authorities"}]}
